frontmatter.description: It’s really about how much confidence you have in your code. The earlier you can gain confidence that your code change is correct, the faster you can deliver.
frontmatter.title: The Mathematical Basis for “Shift Left”

frontmatter.description: High quality developers will continuously operate in an environment of high uncertainty, which by definition is an environment in which it is extremely difficult to provide an estimated time to completion with any degree of certainty.
frontmatter.title: Estimation Accuracy in Software Engineering
